text_block_list.text: A short while had passed since I became Mejiro Palmer's trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Okay, one more lap!

It's a nice and refreshing feeling to be able to watch 
someone run with a sense of liveliness and joy.

She's always giving it her all. Running in an honest 
and straightforward manner from the get-go, with no 
hesitation… evocative of the Freestyle Race.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
YEEEEHAWWWWW!! I'M GONNA LEAVE 
YA'LL LAGGING BEHIND, BABY————!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— GAH! HAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Haa, hah, haaa……… haha! Man, this is so much fun!

From beginning to end she's in a full-on sprint with no brakes, 
which demands masterful handling of energy distribution.

Even so, I have no intention of making drastic changes 
to her current running style. In order to preserve this 
smile on her face, I will need to explore various ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Trainer! I'm up for more runs!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha. Alright, I will!
I want to keep her running in a way that's true to herself!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Isn't running like that too reckless?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Of course her enjoyment is important, but how do I put this… 
That style of running might make you lose winnable races. 
I think it's just too much of an unconventional strategy…

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Rather than just recklessly charging forward 
without a proper plan, I'm thinking there should 
be a more fitting way for her to run.
What does she mean by "more fitting"…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ha, haa…… haah…… wheeew……

In any kind of race, there are rules. And within those rules, 
everyone seeks to pursue their own sense of "individuality".

So what if her running style is seen as overly reckless? 
If breaking conventional norms is what defines the way 
she runs, then I ——

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So what I mean is, don't let her do something so reckless. 
I'm telling you for her sake as we—

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Huh?

Even if it's not acknowledged at the moment, one day, 
I will definitely make them say, "The way she runs fits 
her perfectly!".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you seemed kinda troubled when you were talking 
to that other trainer today. Did something happen?
choice_data_list: Not really, she just struck up a quick chat.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I see! You do look like the easy to talk to type, hey～ 
Ah, did she approach you with a question or something? 
Is that why you looked so ponderous?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Oh my! You don't mean…… she's in love?! 
No way, did she ask you out, Trainer? Good stuff～!
choice_data_list: <size=34>No, no! I just received some complaints, that's all!</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, alright, alright. Complaints, huh? 
But if someone went out of their way for 
that during our training session, then…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It's probably about my running, right? 
Hmm, okay! Well, I can kinda understand why!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(… Yeah, even I knew that I was being reckless. 
But it's not fair for Trainer to get criticized because of me…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Hey, Traine—
choice_data_list: I'll get her to admit it someday, I promise!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
choice_data_list: That this is Mejiro Palmer's way of running!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… Ahaha! You're right! You're absolutely right! 
We're definitely… definitely gonna make her admit it!

We both raised our hands into the sky, and with 
a firm, resounding clap, our palms met.

Regardless of what anyone might say, or how people 
might laugh at us, we made a promise to keep pushing 
onward to the ends of the earth.
